name: House Of Shadows (itch) (HouseOfShadows)
description:
Laurel Tyndall -

  •                 Game Desiger/Creative Director/Project Manager
  •                 Narrative Designer/Lead Writer
  •                 Narrative Implementation
  •                 UI Systems Design and Implementation
  •                 Main Menu Design and Implementation
  •                 Fountain Stars Mini Game Design/Implementation/Full Coding
  •                 Living Room Folder Mini Game Design/Implementation/Full Coding
  •                 Underground Slider Puzzle Mini Game Design/Implementation/Coding
  •                 Immersive Set Dresser (Prop Manager) - Kitchen/Hallway/Maze Center
  •                 Level Designer - Underground Passage
  •                 Character Avatar Designer/Animator/Implementation - Alex/Anne/Ghost
  •                 Main Characters AI Design and Implementation - Alex/Anne/Ghost
  •                 Player Movement Navigation Rules and Implementation
  •                 All Cutscene Design and Implementation
  •                 Audio Design and Implementation

Justin Masters-

  • Worked on scene testing and bugfixing
  • Created the raven minigame and snake minigame.
  • Created the Hedge Maze, Living Room, Gate, Hedge Maze Center, and House Exterior levels.
  • Worked on general scripting.
  • Created Game Manager and Inventory systems.
  • Created game save system.

Steven Chamale-

  • Created Mouse Game
  • Helped Create Kitchen Scene, and provided models.
  • Worked On AI scripts of Mouse and Wolf
  • Level Designer Kitchen Mouse Game
  • Animator Mouse and Wolf

Nicholas Callender-

  • Level Designer – Intro House / House Hallway / House Grounds / Kitchen
  • Texture Art
  • Material Art
  • Lighting Systems –Intro House/House Hallway
  • Level Scaling
